apply.title: Apply
apply.description: When you submit your application a person from our team will contact you to tailor the best solution for you and your business.

apply.success: Successfully submitted! You will be redirected to home.

subscriptions.title: Subscriptions

plans.cancelText: If you want to cancel or upgrade the subscription, contact support at support@uploy.app or call +359 882 764 107

includes: AS many questionnaires as you want

custom.title: Custom

return.title: Success!
return.description: Your subscription has been activated and you will be charged from tomorrow on! You can start using our services as of tomorrow! Enjoy your new business accession! If you have any questions, do not mind and message or call us.

cancel.title: Canceled!
